text.name: Suddenly, One Day
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 6 of a random status, chosen from Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking

passiveList.name: Uncontrolled Morph
passiveList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if below 25% HP, heal 15 HP and gain 2 Protection.
When this effect activates, inflict 1 random other ally & 1 random enemy with +2 SP Loss Efficiency.
